Interface LineItemTemplateServiceInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:

    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface LineItemTemplateServiceInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LineItemTemplatePage getLineItemTemplatesByStatement(Statement filterStatement)
      Gets a LineItemTemplatePage of LineItemTemplate objects that satisfy the given Statement.query.

    • Method Detail

      • getLineItemTemplatesByStatement

        LineItemTemplatePage getLineItemTemplatesByStatement(Statement filterStatement)
                                                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                                            ApiException
        Gets a LineItemTemplatePage of LineItemTemplate objects that satisfy the given Statement.query. The following fields are supported for filtering:
        PQL Property Object Property
        id LineItemTemplate.id
        Parameters:
        filterStatement - a Publisher Query Language statement used to filter a set of line item templates
        Returns:
        the line item templates that match the given filter
        Throws:
        ApiException - if a RuntimeException is thrown
        java.rmi.RemoteException
